name: Runtopia
description:
"Runtopia is a short platformer game where you can run, jump, and interact with animals. Avoid various obstacles and interact with other players as you try to reach the finish line!" Controls
  • Move : WASD
  • Jump : Space
  • Sit : C
  • Wall Jump : double-tapping Spacebar
  • Parkour : E
  • Use Item : Q
  • Place Item : leftclick
  • Grab : leftClick
  • Respawn : G
